header.title: Digital Threat and Vulnerability Management Officer

contentText: Hi, My name is Siwanont Sittinam. I am a dedicated, hardworking, and proactive Cybersecurity Engineer. I am interested in Cybersecurity, Networking, Data Analytics and Web Development.
I constantly seek new knowledge and actively develop new skills to improve myself. I seek challenging chances where I can fully use my skills for the success of the organization.

archieve: • Researching the text clustering by meaning in each context.
• Words Grouping by transforming text to Word2Vec Model.
• Building API services calculating text similarity with Word2Vec Model using Flask and GenSim Library.
• Building a web application to display data resulting from API services with ReactJS.
• Studying automated find bugs with the review code process.
• Studying face detection and recognition to build an authorization system with biometric on Raspberry Pi.
• Writing a research paper in order to study the relationship of twitter users from tweets with Ego Network.
• Classifying Twitter user behavior from user's tweets with Google Cloud Natural Language and Inserting results into MongoDB.
• Building a web visualization to visualize the relationship of users with NodeJS, ExpressJS, and Bootstrap and building an Ego Network graph with D3JS.
• Studying the threat unawareness with the SSL/TLS certificate of the top 50 university websites.
• Collecting SSL/TLS certificate and ranking web domain trust with TestSSL.sh and Javascript.
• Building a web dashboard to display the rank of web domain trust with description using NextJS and SemanticUI.

items.name: SCB
items.keyword: Also known as Siam Commercial Bank
items.role: Digital Threat and Vulnerability Management Officer
archiev: • Being responsible for Penetration Testing, Vulnerability Assessment and Hardening.
• Being responsible for Cloud Security and Compliance Orchestration.

items.name: REFINITIV
archiev: • Being responsible for LAN Implementation and troubleshooting to resolve the incident by following the ITIL process.
• Working with network devices and network automation.
• Working with the architecture teams, management teams, and other implementation teams to follow enterprise architecture standards and company policies.

• Building the TUMBUN Donation Platform that is a part of the Company Sustainability Project to help people living in poverty. Being responsible for enabling financial services through a payment gateway; OMISE, logging transaction in MongoDB, and building API services connecting with the Front-end side by using NodeJS and ExpressJS.

items.name: INTERNET MARKETING
items.keyword: Also known as PANTIP - The popular internet forum in Thailand
archiev: • Being responsible for building a web dashboard monitoring active users and Analyzing Social Influencer with Social Graph and Trend keywords with Wordcloud.
• Building a web application with NodeJS, ExpressJS, and Bootstrap and text visualization with D3JS.

course.who: ETDA, Bank of Thailand, Securities and Exchange Commission of Thailand
